author: perrotta
body:
FastSim customization for the forthcoming HLT menu for Run2 (no effect on current menu in cmssw)
Use GEN-SIM input files with ak4 (instead of ak5) GenJets in the private HLT tests
(There is little to test in this PR, sorry...)
title: FastSim customization, and ak4 GEN-SIM compatible input file in HLT tests
